ygData.subject: Re: Can you enchant stacks or Silver at Once?
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t we all wish we could do stacks...
ygData.messageBody:
Don't we all wish we could do stacks...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Charles Adams [SMTP:sirkal@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 11, 1999 3:07 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Can you enchant stacks or Silver at Once?
>
> From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>
>
> Not yet 16th so I was wondering if you can enchant an entire stack of
> silver at once, or if you have to do it 1 bar at a time?
>
> Charles
>
